name: Attack on Titan 3D: Glory of Shiganshina (Alternate Ending if Levi Appeared on Episode 1)
name_original: Attack on Titan 3D: Glory of Shiganshina (Alternate Ending if Levi Appeared on Episode 1)
description:
Fan Made Game of Attack on Titan 

You play as Levi Ackerman, this game happens in S1E1 of Attack on Titan Anime. But we make an alternate ending of that episode where Levi Ackerman will protect Shiganshina District from Armored Titan and Colossal Titan, while in the real movie, that episode was the fall of Shiganshina District.

First, you will be facing some titans outside the wall, in the forest to be precise, to do your job as survey corps. After killing some titans, you will be informed that Colossal and Armored Titan had broken through the Wall Maria and made chaos in Shiganshina District. 

So, you as Levi Ackerman will have to protect the district from Titans, and hopefully Eren's mother will not have to die as we know from the 1st episode.

This game was made in 1 month by 2 Indonesian Gamedev Youtubers Livander Gamedev and Kokapa Game Dev

Livander: https://www.youtube.com/livandergamedev

Kokapa: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXx37tglnyeICvW2M6v0DJg
